span.span: We enable all Sherman Students to become the best possible version of themselves. We provide an environment where our children develop into empathetic, self-directed, critical thinkers who don't give up when faced with challenges.

span.strong: "The Sherman School is so much more than a building, it is more like a second home that holds countless memories."
